GSD.product_version: versions from v4.2 to before v4.19.256
GSD.description:
ASoC: mediatek: mt8173: Fix refcount leak in mt8173_rt5650_rt5676_dev_probe

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.19.256 by commit fab5eb31819a2693b0c3d6f3df6a0d193af9a089, it was introduced in version v4.2 by commit 94319ba10ecabc8f28129566d1f5793e3e7a0a79. For more details please see the references link.
